item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Jan Picek and I’m a student of mathematical informatics at Masaryk University in Brno, Czech Republic, but my home is in České Budějovice. I chose to study computer science, because my dad has engineer degree in cybernetics and he’s been a big influence. I guess that computer science is pretty much in our whole family. Even my grandfather worked as data analyst (he used to use punched cards to code which I find quite amazing) and my brother is studying for Master’s degree in bioinformatics at Charles University.
